summary:
• Architected high-scale payment processing infrastructure using Python/FastAPI, PostgreSQL, and Redis that processes $5M+ in healthcare payments across 9 million patient encounters - refactored legacy system into a more scalable architecture supporting real-time encounter-level posting.
• Designed and launched a claims reconciliation platform using React, TypeScript, and MUI that achieved 100% adoption across all healthcare sites - led technical design while collaborating with ops, design, and account management teams to standardize workflows and provide real-time visibility into blocked claims.
• Drove development of automated insurance detection system using Python/FastAPI in 2-person team, identifying missing coverage and resubmitting over 14k claims automatically - saved patients $1.54M in out-of-pocket costs and increased eligibility denial auto-resubmission rate from 12% to 20%.

· Created an internal tool that anonymizes customer databases for testing ensuring customer data remains private.
· Helped implement a DDNS update distribution service, enhancing system reliability by efficiently distributing updates across a cluster of DNS/DHCP servers.
· Implemented database triggers to automate table partition creation, mitigating database size growth.
· Innovated a novel image compression ML algorithm for gigapixel image classification, achieving 96.39% accuracy. Submitted the research paper for publication at the ImNO conference.

· Assistend in implementing TLS encryption between the communication channels of DNS and DHCP servers.
· Maintained a minimal tech debt by contributing to 10+ automation tests and fixed 20+ bugs.

· Implemented and tested various deep-learning speech recognition algorithms for single-switch users increasing accessibility for those with disabilities.
· Created a POC mobile application and presented it successfully to stakeholders for further development of the technology.

· Developed machine learning models for internal highway detection, vehicle tracking, and lane detection.
· Presented the roadmap to multiple govt. stakeholders for further investments.
· Improved real-time performance by 775% allowing for real-time inference from 4 streams on a single GPU.

· Created a school management system that supports video calls.
· Communicated regularly with stakeholders and implemented their needs iteratively.
